code: import React from'react';import'./Awards.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Awards=()=>{const awards=[{title:"Engineering Graduate Scholarship",organization:"Arizona State University",date:"July 2022",icon:"fas fa-trophy"},{title:"Dean's Merit Scholarship",organization:"SASTRA",date:"2019-20, 2020-21",icon:"fas fa-medal"},{title:"Indian Central Government Scholarship",organization:"Government of India",date:"2018-2022",icon:"fas fa-award"},{title:"Academic Excellence Award",organization:"SASTRA University",date:"2021",icon:"fas fa-star"}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{id:"awards",className:"awards",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"section-title",children:"Awards & Recognition"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"awards-grid",children:awards.map((award,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"award-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"award-icon",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:award.icon})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"award-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:award.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[award.organization," \u2022 ",award.date]})]})]},index))})]})});};export default Awards;
